rows: Analyze bulk email bounces by examining specific bounce responses with reasons and recommendations

Enables marketers to gain detailed insights into why an email failed to deliver and receive actionable recommendations to prevent similar issues in the future. This reduces email bounces in future sending, i.e., improves bounce rate. Such an approach to bounce analysis minimizes manual effort and reduces the time required to diagnose and resolve bounce-related issues.
Generate performance analysis report of a support case

Provides a concise view of key metrics like resolution time, number of interactions, and customer satisfaction. Highlights reasons for escalations and suggests areas for improvement. Saves time by offering a clear, high-level performance summary without diving into technical details.Can improve the average time to resolution, escalation rate, customer satisfaction score (CSAT), and agent performance metrics KPIs.
Generate a knowledge base article based on the support case conversation and resolution.
Case Management + Knowledge Management, both are required

Significantly enhances the daily workflow of any employee required to send a large number of emails.Streamlines the knowledge creation process and reduces the manual effort required. Ensures valuable information is captured and reused. This improves customer service efficiency. Enhances self-service capabilities by providing accurate and up-to-date information to customers.Can improve the knowledge base utilization rate, first contact resolution (FCR), and customer effort score (CES) KPIs.
Analyze bulk email subject lines for potential spam words and flag them, then generate alternative suggestions that are more attractive and less likely to be marked as spam

Enables marketers to check for any words or phrases that can be caught by spam filters quickly before sending. Certain words or phrases can trigger spam filters, so tools help avoid them to ensure better email deliverability. Subject lines can make or break whether an email gets opened, and tools can suggest more engaging options to boost open rates. Helps maintain a consistent tone and brand voice across all subject lines, even in different campaigns. Minimizes mistakes like typos or inconsistencies in subject lines, ensuring quality and accuracy. Saves time, avoiding the need to come up with new ideas manually.
Enrich account data by searching them online with Bing. Requires Bing Search API key.
Enables marketers and sales teams to get a complete view of an account as quickly as possible.

Improves communication by making it easy to modify text for different needs, ensuring professionalism. Saves time by automating text revisions. Ensures consistent messaging across teams, leading to a unified brand voice.Can improve customer satisfaction score (CSAT), response time, content quality, and email open and response rates KPIs.
Rewrites any rich text to make it more formal
Rewrites any rich text to make it more friendly
Generate a personalized call script for a Business Development Representative to prepare them for a meeting with a client at the Discovery stage
Enables business development representatives to prepare for calls quickly and work as efficiently as possible.
Generate a short description for the Product and save it in the corresponding field
Enables copywriters to generate effective copy as quickly as possible.
Generate a short description for the Product
Find a slot for the meeting with needed people within the company

Simplifies scheduling by automatically checking availability and proposing suitable time slots. Ensures smooth coordination across different time zones, avoiding scheduling conflicts. Saves time by automating meeting logistics, allowing users to focus on high-value tasks.Can improve scheduling efficiency, meeting attendance rate, and time spent on meeting coordination KPIs.
Generate an email to Contact or Account based on your query and open the email page.
Significantly enhances the daily workflow of any employee required to send a large number of emails.
Generate personalized recommendations for a Sales Executive to prepare them for a meeting with a client at the Opportunity stage
Lead and Opportunity Management + Productivity, both are required
Enables sales executives to prepare for meetings quickly and work as efficiently as possible.
Generate a personalized agenda for a client meeting, based on the Opportunity data and user input. Include relevant topics, key agenda items, and suggested next steps.
Lead and Opportunity Management + Productivity, both are required
Enables sales executives to personalize their approach quickly and easily, all while staying relevant and effective.
Provide a detailed explanation of the aspects that affect the account's lead conversion score and their impact.

The account’s lead conversion score provides valuable insights into how engaged and ready an account’s contacts are for sales efforts. Calculated by an ML model and influenced by factors like the company’s country, industry, and the average lead conversion score of associated contacts, it helps marketers prioritize accounts for personalized, account-based marketing strategies.Creatio.ai provides insights into the factors affecting the score. This can be helpful in the following cases:Account-based marketing (ABM). Marketers can use conversion scores to identify and focus on high-value accounts, crafting bespoke marketing strategies tailored to the needs and pain points of those accounts. This drives higher engagement and conversion.Campaign segmentation. Conversion score details enable marketers to segment accounts and their contacts properly based on their readiness to convert. This leads to more relevant outreach and content delivery across different stages of the customer journey.Cross-selling and upselling. For existing accounts, marketers can use conversion insights to identify opportunities for cross-sell and upsell campaigns, targeting accounts that show interest in additional products or services, thus maximizing revenue potential.
Provide a detailed explanation of the aspects that affect the contact's lead conversion score and their impact.

The contact’s lead conversion score explains the probability of a contact becoming a marketing qualified lead (MQL). This information is calculated based on an ML model that can be tailored to the specific business needs of a customer.It is important for marketers to understand the details of the score in order to grasp what influences the probability of a contact becoming an MQL clearly. For example, their country of residence, the account with which they are, the channel or source, or even the number of submissions from the contact. These details can be provided by Creatio.ai and assist in the following cases:Proper campaign targeting. Focus on contacts that have specific parameters identified by Creatio.ai to design tailored campaigns. This increases the relevance and effectiveness of your messaging and leads to improved conversion rates.Budget Optimization. Instead of spreading resources thin across all contacts, you can allocate your budgets more efficiently by targeting those most likely to convert. This maximizes ROI.Lead Handoff to Sales. You can collaborate more effectively with sales teams by providing insights into contact behavior. This makes it easier to hand off well-qualified leads that have higher conversion potential.
Provide a detailed explanation of the aspects that affect the lead's probability score and their impact

Sales Lead PrioritizationGenerates descriptions for lead scoring criteria to help sales teams identify and prioritize the most valuable leads based on factors such as engagement level, industry fit, and potential revenue. Enhances the efficiency of sales teams by focusing on high-potential leads. This leads to better allocation of resources and improved conversion rates.With details on the calculation criteria used and their indicators for a particular lead, the manager can easily understand the areas to focus on, what information can be used on the lead to take the successful next steps in preparing and making a sale. It lets you understand and assess how close a potential customer is to the ideal target customer profile and more accurately assess its potential.This lets you reduce the time it takes to find the necessary important details for a lead and to prepare for calls, meetings, and proposals more efficiently.CRM Lead ManagementHelps CRM managers establish clear lead scoring guidelines within the system. This provides a structured approach to qualify leads based on historical data and behavioral indicators.Improves CRM systems by providing a standardized approach to lead scoring. This makes lead management more efficient and data-driven.
Generate product recommendations and send a tailored offer to the customer
Order and Contract Management + Customer 360, both are required
Enables sales associates to suggest products and upsell or cross-sell the customer quickly and easily.

Improves communication by making it easy to modify text for different needs, ensuring professionalism. Saves time by automating text revisions. Ensures consistent messaging across teams, leading to a unified brand voice.Can improve customer satisfaction score (CSAT), response time, content quality, and email open and response rates KPIs.
Provide ability to search and work with data based on user query
Greatly enhances the workflow of any employee by providing advanced search capabilities that can be used in Creatio.ai immediately.

Improves communication by making it easy to modify text for different needs, ensuring professionalism. Saves time by automating text revisions. Ensures consistent messaging across teams, leading to a unified brand voice.Can improve customer satisfaction score (CSAT), response time, content quality, and email open and response rates KPIs.
Suggest next steps to resolve a support case

Reduces the time needed to craft personalized responses and speeds up resolution times. Ensures responses are informed by the most relevant and effective solutions. This enhances customer satisfaction. Improves consistency in communication. This leads to a more reliable customer experience.Can improve the response time, customer satisfaction score (CSAT), and resolution rate KPIs.
Generate a summary based on meeting minutes

Provides clear and concise summaries of meetings by highlighting key points and action items. Saves time by eliminating the need to manually sift through lengthy transcripts. Improves team alignment and follow-through on decisions and tasks.Can improve the meeting productivity, action item completion rate, and team alignment and communication KPIs.
Generate a summary of a support case

Saves time by reducing the need to manually read through long case histories. Enhances productivity and ensures consistent communication. Improves service quality and response times.Can improve the average case handling time, first response time, and customer satisfaction score (CSAT) KPIs.
Generate a summary of a lead

Sales handover efficiencySimplifies the transition between sales team members by generating summaries of key lead details and interactions. This ensures smooth handovers. The AI Skill helps minimize the risk of missed information and keeps the team aligned with lead progress. This enhances collaboration and accuracy during handovers.Quick decision-making for sales associatesEnhances the ability of sales associates to prioritize leads quickly and focus on the most promising opportunities as well as track progress and identify the next steps. This improves overall sales performance, lead management, conversion rates, and response times.
Generate a summary of an opportunity

Quick decision-making for sales associatesBy offering concise summaries of leads and opportunities, this AI Skill empowers sales managers to make quick, informed decisions about prioritizing leads and identifying high-potential opportunities. It streamlines the decision-making process, reducing time spent manually gathering and analyzing data.Opportunity MonitoringSales associates and their managers can monitor the status and development of opportunities by getting real-time insights and updates. This ensures that teams are always aware of changes in lead status and can respond proactively to emerging opportunities.Keeps teams updated on changes in lead and opportunity status, ensuring timely responses and proactive engagement with potential customers.

Improves communication by making it easy to modify text for different needs, ensuring professionalism. Saves time by automating text revisions. Ensures consistent messaging across teams, leading to a unified brand voice.Can improve customer satisfaction score (CSAT), response time, content quality, and email open and response rates KPIs.

Enables marketers to gain detailed insights into why an email failed to deliver and receive actionable recommendations to prevent similar issues in the future. This reduces email bounces in future sending, i.e., improves bounce rate. Such an approach to bounce analysis minimizes manual effort and reduces the time required to diagnose and resolve bounce-related issues.

Can improve the average time to resolution, escalation rate, customer satisfaction score (CSAT), and agent performance metrics KPIs.

Certain words or phrases can trigger spam filters, so tools help avoid them to ensure better email deliverability. Helps maintain a consistent tone and brand voice across all subject lines, even in different campaigns. Minimizes mistakes like typos or inconsistencies in subject lines, ensuring quality and accuracy. Saves time, avoiding the need to come up with new ideas manually.

Provide account conversion insights

Provide a detailed explanation of the aspects that affect the account's lead conversion score and their impact.

Lead Generation

The account’s lead conversion score provides valuable insights into how engaged and ready an account’s contacts are for sales efforts. Calculated by an ML model and influenced by factors like the company’s country, industry, and the average lead conversion score of associated contacts, it helps marketers prioritize accounts for personalized, account-based marketing strategies.

Creatio.ai provides insights into the factors affecting the score. This can be helpful in the following cases:

  • Account-based marketing (ABM). Marketers can use conversion scores to identify and focus on high-value accounts, crafting bespoke marketing strategies tailored to the needs and pain points of those accounts. This drives higher engagement and conversion.
  • Campaign segmentation. Conversion score details enable marketers to segment accounts and their contacts properly based on their readiness to convert. This leads to more relevant outreach and content delivery across different stages of the customer journey.
  • Cross-selling and upselling. For existing accounts, marketers can use conversion insights to identify opportunities for cross-sell and upsell campaigns, targeting accounts that show interest in additional products or services, thus maximizing revenue potential.

8.2 Energy and later

Provide contact conversion insights

Provide a detailed explanation of the aspects that affect the contact's lead conversion score and their impact.

Lead Generation

The contact’s lead conversion score explains the probability of a contact becoming a marketing qualified lead (MQL). This information is calculated based on an ML model that can be tailored to the specific business needs of a customer.

It is important for marketers to understand the details of the score in order to grasp what influences the probability of a contact becoming an MQL clearly. For example, their country of residence, the account with which they are, the channel or source, or even the number of submissions from the contact. These details can be provided by Creatio.ai and assist in the following cases:

  • Proper campaign targeting. Focus on contacts that have specific parameters identified by Creatio.ai to design tailored campaigns. This increases the relevance and effectiveness of your messaging and leads to improved conversion rates.
  • Budget Optimization. Instead of spreading resources thin across all contacts, you can allocate your budgets more efficiently by targeting those most likely to convert. This maximizes ROI.
  • Lead Handoff to Sales. You can collaborate more effectively with sales teams by providing insights into contact behavior. This makes it easier to hand off well-qualified leads that have higher conversion potential.

8.2 Energy and later

Provide lead probability insights

Provide a detailed explanation of the aspects that affect the lead's probability score and their impact

Lead and Opportunity Management

Sales Lead Prioritization

Generates descriptions for lead scoring criteria to help sales teams identify and prioritize the most valuable leads based on factors such as engagement level, industry fit, and potential revenue. Enhances the efficiency of sales teams by focusing on high-potential leads. This leads to better allocation of resources and improved conversion rates.

With details on the calculation criteria used and their indicators for a particular lead, the manager can easily understand the areas to focus on, what information can be used on the lead to take the successful next steps in preparing and making a sale. It lets you understand and assess how close a potential customer is to the ideal target customer profile and more accurately assess its potential.

This lets you reduce the time it takes to find the necessary important details for a lead and to prepare for calls, meetings, and proposals more efficiently.

CRM Lead Management

Helps CRM managers establish clear lead scoring guidelines within the system. This provides a structured approach to qualify leads based on historical data and behavioral indicators.

Improves CRM systems by providing a standardized approach to lead scoring. This makes lead management more efficient and data-driven.

8.2 Energy and later

Recommend products

Generate product recommendations and send a tailored offer to the customer

Order and Contract Management + Customer 360, both are required

Enables sales associates to suggest products and upsell or cross-sell the customer quickly and easily.

Improves communication by making it easy to modify text for different needs, ensuring professionalism. Saves time by automating text revisions. Ensures consistent messaging across teams, leading to a unified brand voice.

Can improve customer satisfaction score (CSAT), response time, content quality, and email open and response rates KPIs.

8.2 Energy and later

Suggest case resolution

Suggest next steps to resolve a support case

Case Management

Reduces the time needed to craft personalized responses and speeds up resolution times. Ensures responses are informed by the most relevant and effective solutions. This enhances customer satisfaction. Improves consistency in communication. This leads to a more reliable customer experience.

Can improve the response time, customer satisfaction score (CSAT), and resolution rate KPIs.

8.2 Energy and later

Summarize activity

Generate a summary based on meeting minutes

Productivity

Provides clear and concise summaries of meetings by highlighting key points and action items. Saves time by eliminating the need to manually sift through lengthy transcripts. Improves team alignment and follow-through on decisions and tasks.

Can improve the meeting productivity, action item completion rate, and team alignment and communication KPIs.

8.2 Energy and later

Summarize case

Generate a summary of a support case

Case Management

Saves time by reducing the need to manually read through long case histories. Enhances productivity and ensures consistent communication. Improves service quality and response times.

Can improve the average case handling time, first response time, and customer satisfaction score (CSAT) KPIs.

8.2 Energy and later

Summarize lead

Generate a summary of a lead

Lead And Opportunity Management

Sales handover efficiency

Simplifies the transition between sales team members by generating summaries of key lead details and interactions. This ensures smooth handovers. The AI Skill helps minimize the risk of missed information and keeps the team aligned with lead progress. This enhances collaboration and accuracy during handovers.

Quick decision-making for sales associates

Enhances the ability of sales associates to prioritize leads quickly and focus on the most promising opportunities as well as track progress and identify the next steps. This improves overall sales performance, lead management, conversion rates, and response times.

8.2 Energy and later

Summarize opportunity

Generate a summary of an opportunity

Lead And Opportunity Management

Quick decision-making for sales associates

By offering concise summaries of leads and opportunities, this AI Skill empowers sales managers to make quick, informed decisions about prioritizing leads and identifying high-potential opportunities. It streamlines the decision-making process, reducing time spent manually gathering and analyzing data.

Opportunity Monitoring

Sales associates and their managers can monitor the status and development of opportunities by getting real-time insights and updates. This ensures that teams are always aware of changes in lead status and can respond proactively to emerging opportunities.

Keeps teams updated on changes in lead and opportunity status, ensuring timely responses and proactive engagement with potential customers.

8.2 Energy and later

Improves communication by making it easy to modify text for different needs, ensuring professionalism. Saves time by automating text revisions. Ensures consistent messaging across teams, leading to a unified brand voice.

Can improve customer satisfaction score (CSAT), response time, content quality, and email open and response rates KPIs.
